summary: "Fortify" enchantments no longer stack with themselves.
descriptionHtml:
This small mod makes the following simple changes to enchantments:

1. "Fortify" enchantments on gear no longer stack. If you equip two Fortify Archery items, only the strongest will have any effect. No more free spells. No more 150% extra damage from weapons.
2. Fortify enchantments no longer scale with Fortify Restoration potions. (This is the same change as that from the Unofficial patch.)
3. Robes now increase the [i]effectiveness[/i] of spells (similar to potions), while all other Fortify (Magic School) items decrease the Magicka cost (as in the base game). For example a Robe of Peerless Alteration makes Alteration spells last 25% longer.

Version 1.2:
1. Improved compatibility with mods that use custom magic effects but vanilla keywords (e.g. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16438/]Dragten's Bandoliers[/url]).
2. The Muffle effect no longer benefits from restoration potions, no longer stacks with itself, and custom Muffle enchantments only provide a 50% benefit (as was clearly originally intended) rather than 100%.

Version 1.1:
1. Offensive enchantments on weapons are no longer affected by Fortify (Magic Skill) potions. (Staves still benefit.)
2. Implemented one minor bugfix affecting the Amulet of Articulation enchantment.

If you want your offensive enchantments to be affected by Fortify potions, you can safely continue to use version 1.0.

The only bug in 1.0 is that the Amulet of Articulation will have a Fortify Barter enchantment instead of a Fortify Persuasion enchantment, which also means that its benefit will stack with other Fortify Barter enchantments but not with Fortify Persuasion enchantments. Short version: Don't wear the Amulet of Articulation with other Fortify Barter/Persuasion items or minor weirdness may ensue.
author: Lofgren
